[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: open_cf_as_secondary()] [Secondary Desync] Can secondary instances desynchronize from primary during high write load, causing state observers to see stale or inconsistent state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: open_cf_as_secondary()] [Secondary Write Pollution] Can secondary instances write data that pollutes the primary's state when primary reopens the secondary path? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: open_cf_readonly()] [Missing CF Silent Failure] Does readonly mode properly fail when critical column families are missing, or does it silently succeed with incomplete state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: put()] [Large Key DoS] Can attackers create arbitrarily large keys through encode_key() that exceed RocksDB limits, causing write failures or performance degradation? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: put()] [Large Value DoS] Can arbitrarily large values be encoded through encode_value() that fill disk space or cause OOM during batch operations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: get()] [Large Value Read] Does get() impose size limits on returned values to prevent memory exhaustion when reading maliciously large values? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: get_property()] [Metadata Exposure] Can get_property() leak sensitive database metadata (like approximate sizes, file counts) that help attackers profile validator storage? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: log_construct()] [Log Injection] Does the logging in log_construct() properly sanitize the name parameter to prevent log injection attacks? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: write_schemas_inner()] [Cross-Schema Atomicity] When a batch spans multiple schemas (column families), does write_schemas_inner() guarantee atomicity across all schemas, or can partial commits corrupt state? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: get()] [Schema Isolation] Can data leakage occur between different schemas sharing the same DB instance due to inadequate column family isolation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: get()] [Empty Key Handling] Does get() properly handle empty keys (zero-length Vec<u8>) without causing RocksDB errors or returning unexpected results? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: put()] [Empty Value Handling] Can empty values be distinguished from non-existent keys, or does this cause confusion in existence checks? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: delete()] [Delete Non-Existent] Does delete() on non-existent keys properly handle the case without errors, or can this cause unexpected batch failures? (Low)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: open_cf_impl()] [Empty CF List] Can opening a DB with empty column family list cause initialization failures or undefined behavior? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: iter()] [Empty DB Iteration] Do iterators properly handle completely empty databases without panicking or returning invalid data? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: open_cf_impl()] [CF Proliferation] Can an attacker create unlimited column families to exhaust file descriptors or memory on validator nodes? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: write_schemas_inner()] [Batch Accumulation DoS] Can an attacker force accumulation of many pending batches that consume memory before being committed, causing OOM? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: create_checkpoint()] [Checkpoint Space Exhaustion] Can repeated checkpoint creation exhaust disk space, preventing validators from processing new transactions? (High)
[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: get()] [Decode Panic] If decode_value() panics instead of returning an error, can this crash validator nodes during state reads? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: put()] [Encode Non-Determinism] If encode_key() or encode_value() produce non-deterministic output, can this cause different validators to compute different state roots? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: get()] [Unicode Handling] Can improper UTF-8 handling in schema codecs cause deserialization errors or security vulnerabilities when processing international characters? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: cfd_for_unrecognized_cf()] [Descriptor Options Attack] Can malicious ColumnFamilyDescriptor options in unrecognized CFs exploit RocksDB to consume excessive resources or trigger bugs? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: open_impl()] [Default CF Options] Does using Options::default() for column families create security weaknesses compared to hardened configurations? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: write_schemas_inner()] [Intra-Batch Ordering] Does RocksDB guarantee that operations within a single WriteBatch are applied in order, or can reordering cause state inconsistency? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/lib.rs] [Function: put()] [Put-Delete Ordering] If a batch contains both put() and delete() for the same key, is the final state deterministic and correct? (Medium)
